interaction_summary:
=== Purchase Information ===
Product Title: 13x6 Straight Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Pre Plucked Bleached Knots HD Transparent Human Hair Lace Front Wigs 160% Density Glueless Lace Frontal Human Hair Wigs for Women Natural Hairline (18 Inch)
Review Date: 2022/07/02
Store: Gelbive
Average Rating: 4.2
Product Details: {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'Gelbive', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '12.28 x 10.91 x 3.07 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '746555819598'}
Review Text: [[VIDEOID:84b767f90d17c2a1b68e9f37f8dbc402]] It has potential but it depends on how you are with wigs. Straight out of the pack, it looks really nice. It had great parting space . Once I started combing through it, I realized that the hair on the lace part is shorter than the rest of the hair. Because of that, it makes the hair look very damaged. It has a ton of short hairs. You cannot straighten those to look smooth. Even with a wax stick, it didn’t help them.
Review Title: Not the best
Rating: 3.0
--------------------------------------------------
reference_summary:
13X6 Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Pre Plucked With Baby Hair Brazilian Virgin Hair Kinky Straight Human Hair Wigs For Women Deep Part Space 13 By 6 Wigs Wet And Wavy 100% Human Hair 9A Grade 20 Inch Isufer {'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Brand': 'Isufer', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '9.69 x 6.85 x 0.94 inches; 12.35 Ounces'} [[VIDEOID:3de2bb88b3773ef8a1507ffa36dfd57c]] This whole wig is a scam. I’m really trying to understand where all of these great reviews came from.
This is worth Nowhere near the amount of money that I paid for this. The hairline was not pre-plucked, the knots were not bleached, and the frontal part is not the same length as the rest of the hair. I ordered a 20 inch and the frontal part is maybe 10 inches long.
I have included pictures. This will be going back today. So disappointed Persephone Curly Headband Wig Human Hair Pixie Cut Wigs for Black Women Natural Color 8 Inch Persephone ['Persephone Curly Headband Wig Human Hair Pixie Cut Wigs for Black Women Natural Color 8 Inch'] {'Color': 'curly headband', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Brand': 'Persephone', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '12.7 x 9.1 x 1.4 inches; 6.07 Ounces'} [[VIDEOID:d0c52af0efb43e01223c088eae46c351]] This is definitely a wig that you will have to play with to get it where you want it. But no complaints for me. No weird smell and the hair curls nicely. It’s cute but you have to play with it… LVWIGXE Short Wigs China Virgin Hair with Baby Hair 13X4X1 T Part Hairline Silky Straight Bob Wigs for Black Women 180% Density Lace Front Wigs Human Hair 14 Inch, Orange (T Part ) Lvwigxe {'Color': 'Orange', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Brand': 'Lvwigxe', 'Package Dimensions': '13.35 x 8.15 x 2.2 inches; 8.78 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'Lvwigxe'} I’m pleasantly surprised with this wig. It’s soft, doesn’t shed, and is exactly as described. There are some short hairs in the way but it’s nothing major. The lace is not harsh at all. If you’re into colored hair, I would definitely recommend this. It’s cute… ZILING Body Wave 13x4 Lace Front Wigs Human Hair for Black Women Pre Plucked with Baby Hair 150% Density Brazilian Body Wave Human Hair Lace Front Wigs 16 Inch ZILING {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Style': 'Modern', 'Special Feature': 'Tangle Free', 'Brand': 'ZILING', 'Package Dimensions': '11.26 x 9.76 x 1.65 inches; 6.38 Ounces'} It’s a nice wig for the most part. The hair doesn’t fall the same way it does in the pictures. Also the knots are very big on this unit. They look like ants to be honest. It is not preplucked. Basic unit…nothing that stands out YILITE Blue Tape in Hair Extensions Human Hair 10pcs 20g Tape in Human Hair Extensions Blue Tape Hair Extensions 14 inches YILITE {'Brand': 'YILITE', 'Material': 'Human Hair', 'Extension Length': '14 Inches', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Installation Type': 'Tape-In', 'Package Dimensions': '11.73 x 2.64 x 0.59 inches; 1.13 Ounces', 'UPC': '737353301699'} [[VIDEOID:a60247ffbd9b2dafeea155a50c4972d7]] They pulled off the greatest heist with this one. 😂
This is not the same color that is posted. Do not waste your money.

Update: The seller updated the color. If you look at my video, the color that was posted was a dark blue. After my review, they updated the color to show light blue. Not the same color. I wouldn’t buy it 13x6 Straight Lace Front Wigs Human Hair Pre Plucked Bleached Knots HD Transparent Human Hair Lace Front Wigs 160% Density Glueless Lace Frontal Human Hair Wigs for Women Natural Hairline (18 Inch) Gelbive {'Material': 'Human', 'Hair Type': 'Straight', 'Special Feature': 'Glueless', 'Brand': 'Gelbive', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Package Dimensions': '12.28 x 10.91 x 3.07 inches; 8.47 Ounces', 'UPC': '746555819598'} [[VIDEOID:84b767f90d17c2a1b68e9f37f8dbc402]] It has potential but it depends on how you are with wigs. Straight out of the pack, it looks really nice. It had great parting space . Once I started combing through it, I realized that the hair on the lace part is shorter than the rest of the hair. Because of that, it makes the hair look very damaged. It has a ton of short hairs. You cannot straighten those to look smooth. Even with a wax stick, it didn’t help them. Not the best
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user continues to favor high-quality human hair wigs and extensions, maintaining an interest in vibrant colors while prioritizing realism and comfort in their choices.

- **Quality Expectation:** Their high standards for product quality are evident, but recent interactions have heightened their scrutiny regarding product accuracy. Discrepancies between advertised and actual product features have become a significant concern.

- **Adaptability:** The user remains adaptable to styling changes but has shown increased caution when faced with products that do not meet their expectations, particularly regarding hair length consistency and overall appearance.

- **Attention to Detail:** The user’s attention to detail is ongoing, and they are less tolerant of imperfections that impact the final look. They now prioritize products that align closely with their quality benchmarks.

- **Value Perception:** Their recent experience reflects a blend of satisfaction and critique, underscoring their desire for both performance and aesthetic appeal. They balance evaluation based on both strengths and the impact of any shortcomings.

- **Communication Style:** The user provides thoughtful feedback that highlights both strengths and weaknesses, continuing to emphasize the importance of transparency in product representation.

Overall, the user is a discerning buyer committed to quality and authenticity, closely monitoring new styles while exhibiting vigilance toward accuracy and adherence to promotional claims in their purchases.
